caption.title: Metabolites (total amino acids, total soluble proteins, NO 3 -) extracted from fine roots of beech seedlings in June.
caption.p: Blue colour represents the control treatment (NW exposure), red colour represents the climate change treatment (SW exposure). Error bars denote standard errors of the mean (n = 4 per time and treatment). Amino acid and NO 3 - metabolite levels were significantly lower in beech seedlings of the climate change treatment.
